about_the_game:
No shovels necessary as you guide Molar the Mole on this wild, 2-D side-scrolling adventure. Relive and reimagine the retro charm of the handheld monochromatic games of the 80's & 90's with MOLAR: Underground. Learn as you go as you are immersed in the intuitive indie game play and fresh soundscapes created by the up and coming Festive Jester studio.

Warm up your play fingers and take aim at carefully animated, 8-bit bosses like the powerful Drillhead, the hot-blooded Mine-Man and the nefarious King Mole! Don't miss a chance to consult with your helpful pal Wormalt, who appears along the way offering sage advice and an opportunity to restore Molar's life meter. Overcome a unique variety of obstacles and maze puzzles using your wits combined with an array of double jumps, zoom attacks, brick breakers, bounce pads and more as the challenge grows at the completion of each level. What are you waiting for? Dig in and buy now to give MOLAR: Underground a shot.
